specifications.subject: G13-24 Product/Process Specifications
specifications.brief_summary: Tobacco Processing is requesting a revision to the filling capacity target for G13-24. Production data to-date has shown that the current specification of 90o is beyond the capability of the process when using stabilization tobaccos.
specifications.recommendation: Consequently, a target of 880 is recommended in order to improve the capability of the process to control to target and provide a more consistent expanded product to Primary Operations. The range will remain unchanged at +/-45.
